Package boundary

Class ReservationUI

Object
ReservationUI
public class ReservationUI
extends Object
Boundary class to output UI and get user input when managing reservation operations ReservationUI shall only talk to a control class and shall not access an entity class object directly
Since:
2021-11-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yew Fu Yen

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static Scanner sc
    A common scanner object for use of all methods in the class

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ReservationUI()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private static void checkReservationUI()
    When user chooses to check/remove reservation booking from reservation_ui, this UI method will be called It first ask the user to select an input type to search reservations under that input type Input type includes ID, table number, customer name, reservation booking date, and view all reservations Searching by ID and table number will result in a single reservation to be printed, as one ID and one table can only associate to one reservation at a time Searching by customer name and booking date will resilt in a list of reservations to be printed, as each customer or each date may have several reservation bookings If a list of reservations is printed, user will be prompted to select a reservation entry
    private static void checkTableUI()
    When user chooses to check table availability from the reservation_ui, this UI method will be called It prints list of table entries, and ask user to choose a table to view its details
    private static void createUI()
    When the user chooses to create a new reservation booking, this UI method will be called Prompts user to enter necessary details to create a new reservation booking Details include name of customer, date and time of booking, no.
    static int listUI​(int outputMode, String string1, String string2, String string3)
    This is the UI method called when system prints a list of entries for reservation ot table After printing the list, it will prompt the user to enter an index to select an entry from the list Press any other non-index key to exit
    static void printSingleReservation​(String name, int id, int noOfPax, Date datetime, Date until, int tableNum)
    Called by reservation manager to print out a reservation's details
    static void printSingleTable​(int tableNum, String reservedBy, String occupiedBy, int seat, String reservedUntil)
    Called by reservation manager to print out a table's details
    private static void removeUI​(Reservation reservation)
    After a reservation is chosen and displayed, prompts the user to choode if he wants to remove the reservation
    static void reservation_ui()
    This will be the entry points of the RRPSS Reservation Manager UI Prompts user to choose for the next operation Operations include create a new reservation booking, check a reservation booking and/or remove it, and check the availability of the tables in the restaurant

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • sc

      private static Scanner sc
      A common scanner object for use of all methods in the class

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationUI

      public ReservationUI()

  • Method Details

    • reservation_ui

      public static void reservation_ui() throws IOException, ParseException
      This will be the entry points of the RRPSS Reservation Manager UI Prompts user to choose for the next operation Operations include create a new reservation booking, check a reservation booking and/or remove it, and check the availability of the tables in the restaurant
      Throws:
      IOException - when user does not input a number when integer input is expected
      ParseException - when user does not enter the date in the right format

    • createUI

      private static void createUI() throws ParseException, IOException
      When the user chooses to create a new reservation booking, this UI method will be called Prompts user to enter necessary details to create a new reservation booking Details include name of customer, date and time of booking, no. of pax and contact
      Throws:
      ParseException - when user does not enter the date in the right format
      IOException - when user does not input a number when integer input is expected

    • checkReservationUI

      private static void checkReservationUI() throws IOException, ParseException
      When user chooses to check/remove reservation booking from reservation_ui, this UI method will be called It first ask the user to select an input type to search reservations under that input type Input type includes ID, table number, customer name, reservation booking date, and view all reservations Searching by ID and table number will result in a single reservation to be printed, as one ID and one table can only associate to one reservation at a time Searching by customer name and booking date will resilt in a list of reservations to be printed, as each customer or each date may have several reservation bookings If a list of reservations is printed, user will be prompted to select a reservation entry
      Throws:
      IOException - when user does not input a number when integer input is expected
      ParseException - when user does not enter the date in the right format

    • listUI

      public static int listUI​(int outputMode, String string1, String string2, String string3) throws IOException
      This is the UI method called when system prints a list of entries for reservation ot table After printing the list, it will prompt the user to enter an index to select an entry from the list Press any other non-index key to exit
      Parameters:
      outputMode - 0: print list title, 1: print list entry, 2: ask user to choose from list
      string1 - String to be printed (can be title, or customer name or seat)
      string2 - Second string to be printed (ID or status)
      string3 - Third to be printed (index or table name)
      Returns:
      the user's choice of the index number, returns -1 if any other keys is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException - when user does not input a number when an integer input is expected

    • removeUI

      private static void removeUI​(Reservation reservation) throws IOException
      After a reservation is chosen and displayed, prompts the user to choode if he wants to remove the reservation
      Parameters:
      reservation - reservation currently displayed
      Throws:
      IOException - when user does not input a number when integer input is expected

    • checkTableUI

      private static void checkTableUI() throws IOException
      When user chooses to check table availability from the reservation_ui, this UI method will be called It prints list of table entries, and ask user to choose a table to view its details
      Throws:
      IOException - when user foes not input a number when integer input is expected

    • printSingleReservation

      public static void printSingleReservation​(String name, int id, int noOfPax, Date datetime, Date until, int tableNum)
      Called by reservation manager to print out a reservation's details
      Parameters:
      name - name of customer that books the rservatiom
      id - Unique ID for the reservation booking
      noOfPax - No of pax for the reservation
      datetime - Date and time of the booking
      until - Reservation expiry time
      tableNum - Reserved table number

    • printSingleTable

      public static void printSingleTable​(int tableNum, String reservedBy, String occupiedBy, int seat, String reservedUntil)
      Called by reservation manager to print out a table's details
      Parameters:
      tableNum - Table number
      reservedBy - Name of customer that reserved the table
      occupiedBy - Name of customer that occupied the table
      seat - Number of seats of the table
      reservedUntil - Reservation expiry date and time If the table is not reserved pr occupied, reservedBy, occupiedBy and reservedUntil will be N/A
